company_mentions: Shanxi Coal Import and Export Group Co., Ltd.

The Changchunxing Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the southern part of Suan Ci He Village, Zuoyun County, Datong City, Shanxi Province

owners: Shanxi Coal Import and Export Group Co., Ltd.
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Coal International, which is a subsidiary of Shanxi Coal Import and Export Group.
